roleset.name: ship out commodities
roleset.note: EXPORT-V NOTES: Note the passive infinitive. (from export.01-v)

example.name: export-v: active, missing importer
example.text: Westmoreland exports about a fourth of its coal tonnage, including a significant amount of metallurgical coal produced by others that is used by steelmakers overseas.
example.arg: about a fourth of its coal tonnage, including a significant amount of metallurgical coal produced by others that is used by steelmakers overseas

example.name: export-v: passive, missing exporter
example.text: [Some 70% of them]-1 are *trace*-1 to be exported *trace*-1 to the U.S.

example.name: exporting-n
example.text: So he splashed the information on handbills that he distributed throughout the banana - exporting city of Puerto Armuelles , which was ruled by United Fruit Co .
